solution_line_template: We must first convert minutes to hours, so {travel_time_minutes} minutes * (1 hour/{minutes_per_hour} minutes) = <<{travel_time_minutes}*(1/{minutes_per_hour})={travel_time_hours}>>{travel_time_hours} hours
The number of miles Greg travels on his trip home is {travel_time_hours} hours * {speed_mph} mph = <<{travel_time_hours}*{speed_mph}={miles_home}>>{miles_home} miles
The total miles Greg travels is {miles_home} + {miles_to_market} = <<{miles_home}+{miles_to_market}={total_miles}>>{total_miles} miles
